plot: An underworld Don Aslam (Anisur Rahman Milon) hires a bodyguard, Tibro (Kazi Maruf) to protect love of his life Sohana (Eamin Haque Bobby). Tibro finds about that Sohana is held captive ...
title: Dehorokkhi: The Bodyguard
